body_html:
The pb generating files consume lots of binary space. for example, 160.1396kb by test_log.pb.o, 144.4404kb by meta_graph.pb.o which may not be used or appropriate on a mobile device. Is there any solution to remove or replace them?

The following file is a top size analysis by link map file, sorted by size.
text_section_size.txt

body:
The pb generating files consume lots of binary space. for example, 160.1396kb by test_log.pb.o, 144.4404kb by meta_graph.pb.o which may not be used or appropriate on a mobile device. Is there any solution to remove or replace them?

The following file is a top size analysis by link map file, sorted by size.
[text_section_size.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/1449828/text_section_size.txt)
